Description: Pear-shaped loom-weight, roughly oval in section. Towards narrow end a hole 0.7cm in diameter runs through the weight. Estimated weight when complete 600-700gm. damaged at one end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House 211 Room 3 lower fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
